features: 2022 Q4 New PC Case - USB Type-C port included. Upgraded mesh front panel enables greater air ventilation yet dust free with magnetic dust filters on the top and bottom. Liquid cooling ready

Desktop computer case includes 3 ARGB LED Lighting PWM Fans - 2x140mm front fans and 1x120mm rear fan. 7 color and 7 lighting modes are controlled by the C/M button on the top of the case. Sync to the motherboard at the 8th Mode

ATX Case with tempered glass side panel allowing for a great view of your RGB components. Steel front panel/main structure with plenty of room, supports motherboard size of ATX, Micro ATX (mATX) and Mini-ITX
Mid-Tower Chassis with ease installation design. Removable SSD mounting brackets, swappable top fan brackets and bottom side panel PSU and HDD bay. Change with no more pain

Gaming PC Shell Case with professional cable management solution. Extra space behind the motherboard tray for hidden cable organization. I/O essentials, 2xUSB 3.0 Type-A, 1xUSB Type-C, Power button, C/M button, audio out and in on the top

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: LIAN LI LANCOOL 205 MESH C Tempered Glass ATX Computer Case The Lian Li LANCOOL 205 MESH C demonstrates elegance and minimalism in its sleek design. Show off your build with its tempered glass side panel. Fit to house any component you desire. You dream it, you can build it in this case. From water cooling to custom fans! New feature - Type-C port on the top I/O panelClean aesthetic computer caseMesh front panelTempered glass side panelPre-install ARGB fansEasy installation designProfessional cable managementHigh air performance Supporting ATX, mATX and Mini-ITX

Easy To Change, Your Call Swappable top front fan bracket. New feature - A USB type-C port on the top I/O panel. Change Your Mind Again? No More Pain Removable bottom side panel for easy hard drives access change it anytime. easy! Changeable Motherboard Size Support ATX / M-ATX / MINI ITX size motherboard.

Professional Cable Management Extra space behind the motherboard tray for hidden cable organization. Improved Airflow with Mesh Front Panel Upgraded mesh front panel enables greater air ventilation yet dust-free with magnetic dust filters on the top and bottom. Includes 3 ARGB Fans Comes with 3 pre-installed ARGB fans and supports multi-size fans/radiators.

LIAN LI LANCOOL 205 MESH C - Black Model LANCOOL 205 MESH C (Type-C) Case type Tower Chassis Dimensions 205 mm (W) X 415 mm (D) X 485 mm (H) Material Tempered Glass; Mesh Front panel: SPCC 0.8mm; Main structure: SPCC 0.6mm Support Motherboard ATX; M-ATX (Micro ATX); Mini-ITX Expansion Slot 7 Drive Bays (1) 4 X 2.5" SSD or (2) 2 X 2.5" SSD + 2 X 3.5" HDD GPU Length Clearance 350mm (Max) CPU Height Clearance 160mm (max) PSU Support 165mm (max) Radiator Top: 280mm; Front: 280mm Fan Support Top: 2 X 120/140mm (*with removable fan bracket on the top of the case) ; Front: 2 X 140mm; Rear: 1 X 120mm Included Fans 2 X 140mm ARGB PWM Fans; 1 X 120mm ARGB PWM Fan Dust Filter 1 X Front Removable mesh panel; 1 X Bottom Removable Dust Filter' 1 X Top Magnetic Dust Filter I/O Ports 1 X Type C Poer; 1 X Power button; 2 X USB 3.0/3.1 Gen1 (5Gbps) port; 1 X Audio; 1 X Microphone; 1 X LED Color Button / LED Mode Button Liquid Cooling Liquid Cooling Ready and Liquid Cooling Capable

4090 GPU Compatibility We have tested some GPUs and please kindly see below the compatibility. ASUS TUF RTX4090 O24G GAMING: Will fit without NVIDIA adaptor(slimmer power cable required); Won't support vertical installationROG STRIX RTX4090 O24G: Cards will not fit; Won't support vertical installation GIGABYTE GPUs as the below will fit without NVIDIA adaptor(slimmer power cable required); Won't support vertical installation. RTX4090 GAMING OC 3 FAN RTX4090 WINDFORCE 3 FAN MSI GPUs as the below will fit without NVIDIA adaptor(slimmer power cable required); Won't support vertical installation. RTX4090 GAMING TRIO 24GRTX4090 GAMING X TRIO 24GRTX4090 SUPRIM X 24GRTX4090 SUPRIM LIQ X 24G PNY GPUs as the below will fit without NVIDIA adaptor(slimmer power cable required); Won't support vertical installation. RTX4080 16GB XLRRTX4090 24GB XLR8 GAMING ZOTAC GPUs as the below will fit without NVIDIA adaptor(slimmer power cable required); Won't support vertical installation. RTX4090 AMP EXTREME AIRORTX4090 TRINITY (OC)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice micro PC case for small builds!
reviews.reviewText: I used the Lancool 205 Micro case for my first PC build and I couldn't be happier! It's an amazing micro case and I absolutely loved how it turned out. I'm not at all an expert in PC building, but I hope that my feedback helps a bit!Here are my specs- GTX 1050- GIGABYTE B550M DS3H- Crucial Ballistix 3200 MHz DDR4- ARCTIC Freezer 34 eSports DUO- GIM KB-28 RGB Case Fans, 3 Pack White 120mm- EVGA 220-G3-0750-X1 Super Nova 750 G3, 80 Plus Gold 750W- Seagate BarraCuda 2TB Internal Hard Drive HDD- Crucial MX500 1TB- AMD Ryzen 5 3600Pros- Really easy to work with- Lots of different ways to route cables- Simple and minimalist design- Micro tower is small enough to fit on top of a desk without looking too big- Air flow on the back, top, front, below the psu, and on the sides of the front panel (enough to fit total of 5 fans // 1 fan in the back, 2 fans on the top, and 2 fans in the front)- Removeable Magnetic dust filters on the top and the bottom- Fits the ARCTIC Freezer 34 Esports (grey/white) PERFECTLY, goodness I was worried that my cpu cooler wouldn't fit, but it fit absolutely perfect with a tiny bit of room between the tempered glass and the front of the cpu cooler- the gap in the front is big enough to fit a custom rgb panel- the temps are nice! my GPU runs around 35-41°C- the glass feels very high qu (it's pretty heavy too!)Cons- I wasn't sure if this was the motherboard or the case (maybe it was just me?) but I found it very difficult mounting the motherboard onto the case. When I would screw the motherboard onto the case, I just could not get them to go inside. I managed to get the corners in, so I left it at that. This may have just been my fault though and I didn't want to strip the screws :'(- This is me just being a little picky, but I wish the little raised cable management things in the back of the case (I'm not sure what the technical term is) was slightly larger to fit bigger zip ties and velcro cable ties- I wasn't sure if the case was supposed to come with a mounting tray, but mine didn't come with any (I'm still not sure if the mounting is included or not) so I put my HDD in the drive bay and I placed my SSD right on top of the drive bay and zip tied it downOverall, the microATX case is absolutely beautiful and very well made! It's user-friendly and great for beginners that want a smaller build!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolute Champion for the budget- Wouldn't recommend any other case for MicroATX
reviews.reviewText: Originally, I had intended to get the Corsair Crystal 280x, A nice, easy to assemble, and cable manage micro-atx case.However, I found this case right before I was about to order that case, and I am extremely glad I did.-For starters, the price is cheap- 70$ at the time of purchase, which is less than half than the Corsair Crystal 280x. For this price, you get exceptionally high build quality. All panels (all high-quality aluminium and tempered glass) fit perfectly and feel solid, as well as easily attach to the case. It comes with magnetic dust filters for the top and front of the case-Airflow is exceptional, and exhaust/intake restrictions are very little/none. My temps have dropped by 2-4 degress since implementing this case compared to my previous case (using corsair fans, not the stock fans). I had to mount my 240mm radiator for my AIO at the front of the case, as I could not get my fans and radiator to clear my RAM when mounting at the top. Even then, this likely varies from motherboard to motherboard.-The size! It's incredibly small, while maintaining easy part compatiblity (I've seen builds with 3080's fitting, no problem) It's still very easy to build in as long as you use a modular PSU, and you should. It's about the same height as other micro-atx cases, but much thinner. It having a basement certainly helps with the cable management.At the end of the day, I would reccoment this case for anyone building a Micro-ATX system, I'd even go as far to say this is the best bang-for-the-buck case option, maybe even the best in general.In Short:-Amazing Price-Looks Great-High Quality Build-Easy to Build in with Modular PSU-Fits most GPU's-Just get it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Genuinely deserving of 5 stars all around, even coming from an experienced builder
reviews.reviewText: The 205M Mesh case was a pleasure to build in and the cable management couldn't have been easier. It comfortably fits most components and, even without expensive braided cables, your build will look simple and elegant with minimal effort.Construction quality feels very sturdy and has no flimsiness whatsoever (a complaint that pops up in case reviews for other cases at this price point). There are no quirks about this case that I could find that made building in it problematic.If you're looking for micro-ATX case with plenty of wiggle room, good cable management, sturdy construction, and beautiful to look at, just go with this one.
Very strong good quality case. Easy to work around inside. Would buy another in a heartbeat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The case itself looks stylish and simple. I like that you can control the lighting with a button on the case and the program itself. Airy and cool. I recommend!

For 65 EUR this is an awesome well thought through case. Super easy cable management, great build quality and it even comes with 2 pre-installed fans (which are not premium for silent enthusiasts but get the job done)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on October 20, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Best case I ever had.Super well-thought-out design and cable management, nice look, thick glass, all in all wonderful!I only wished the sheet metal at the top and bottom would be a bit thicker, since it flexes under light pressure.But this doesn't at all affect the day-to-day use, and would just contribute to an even more premium feeling product.
